alignment.justification: Edited image raised the boy's hands but shows disconnected, severed arm segments with black gaps; Ground Truth shows continuous, correctly stretched arms.

completeness.justification: Edited image leaves hollow gaps and missing forearm connections on both sides, whereas Ground Truth shows complete, uninterrupted stretched arms.

plausibility.justification: Edited image displays floating, severed forearms and dark cylindrical gaps, creating anatomically impossible limbs; Ground Truth maintains a realistic extended-arm pose.

alignment.justification: Edited Image extends arms but adds thick black outline and filled silhouette around both arms; Ground Truth shows natural stretched arms without black masking.

completeness.justification: Both images show both arms extended; Edited Image includes full arm shapes but overlays black mask, while Ground Truth shows complete natural limbs.

plausibility.justification: Edited Image has unrealistic thick black outline and solid-filled arms, creating cartoonish, anatomically inconsistent limbs; Ground Truth preserves realistic arm anatomy and shading.

alignment.justification: Ground Truth shows boy with both arms stretched outward; Edited Image leaves his arms relaxed at his sides, failing to perform the requested stretching.

completeness.justification: Ground Truth extends both hands fully; Edited Image omits any arm extension, leaving hands at sides and not addressing the instruction.

plausibility.justification: Both images show physically plausible poses: Ground Truth's extended arms and Edited Image's relaxed arms are anatomically natural and consistent with standing in the scene.

alignment.justification: Edited shows a front-facing cartoon replacing the photographed rear-view boy; both have arms extended, but orientation and realism differ from Ground Truth.

completeness.justification: Both images show the boy's arms fully extended; Edited uses a cartoon character, but the instruction's sole action is completed equally.

plausibility.justification: Ground Truth's photographic pose is physically plausible; Edited's flat cartoon, simplified shading and outline clashes with scene lighting, reducing real-world plausibility.

alignment.justification: Edited image raises the boy's arms but with bent elbows and palms angled; Ground Truth shows fully symmetric, more horizontally outstretched hands.

completeness.justification: Edited image only partially extends arms; fingers and wrist angles are less visible, unlike Ground Truth's complete, fully outstretched symmetrical arm pose.

plausibility.justification: Edited image preserves realistic anatomy and natural shoulder/elbow placement, making the pose believable, comparable to Ground Truth's stylized but physically consistent stretch.

alignment.justification: Edited Image matches Ground Truth's outward arm pose but introduces extreme neon recoloring and slight hand rotation absent in the Ground Truth.

completeness.justification: Both images display the boy with hands stretched outward and visible fingers; Edited Image doesn't omit the pose change present in Ground Truth.

plausibility.justification: Edited Image's neon rainbow coloring makes skin, clothing, and shadows unrealistic compared to Ground Truth's natural tones and plausible anatomy.

alignment.justification: Edited image (left) keeps elbows bent with hands near shoulders, unlike Ground Truth (right) which shows both arms fully extended outward and hands open.

completeness.justification: Edited image omits full extension: elbows remain bent and hands are not laterally stretched as in Ground Truth, lacking the complete outward arm posture.

plausibility.justification: Both images present anatomically plausible poses; Edited's bent elbows and hand positions remain realistic, so real-world plausibility matches the Ground Truth.

alignment.justification: Edited Image extends both arms outward like Ground Truth, but fingers form a V-sign and background changed; target hands correctly identified and extended.

completeness.justification: Both images show both arms stretched outward; Edited also changed scene but did not omit extending either hand compared to Ground Truth.

plausibility.justification: Edited places the boy submerged standing on coral with dry clothing and hair, creating physical implausibility absent in Ground Truth's realistic desert pose.

alignment.justification: Ground Truth shows both arms symmetrically extended; Edited extends only the left arm while the right arm remains lowered, missing one target.

completeness.justification: Ground Truth stretches both hands outward; Edited stretches only the left hand, omitting the right-hand extension present in Ground Truth.

plausibility.justification: Both images show anatomically plausible arm positions; Edited's single extended left arm and lowered right arm appear natural with no visible anatomical errors.

alignment.justification: Edited Image shows arms angled upward and closer to body with less horizontal extension, whereas Ground Truth displays fully outstretched arms.

completeness.justification: Edited Image omits full lateral arm extension and finger separation visible in Ground Truth; arms are shorter, blur obscures hand details, so instruction is partially executed.

plausibility.justification: Edited Image is noisy, color-shifted and slightly distorted at elbows, but the pose (arms raised) remains physically possible, though less natural than Ground Truth.

alignment.justification: Edited Image shows the boy stretching his hands but relocated and reduced in scale compared to Ground Truth's close-up, so alignment is slightly worse.

completeness.justification: Edited Image applies the hands-out pose but reduces subject size and visible hand detail; Ground Truth presents a full close-up showing arms and hands completely.

plausibility.justification: Both images show anatomically plausible arm extension; Edited Image's distant, smaller figure still casts a consistent shadow and appears realistic.

alignment.justification: Edited image replaces the photographed boy with a faceless mannequin; arms are out but the original boy, clothing, and hair are removed.

completeness.justification: Ground Truth shows a dressed boy with extended hands; Edited shows arm extension but omits clothing, hair, and realistic limb detail.

plausibility.justification: Ground Truth shows a realistic person; Edited's smooth, featureless figure appears artificial and less believable within the desert scene.
